common_errors.solution: Check DNS server config: resolvectl status. Verify network connectivity.
Start service: sudo systemctl start systemd-resolved
Use sudo: sudo resolvectl dns eth0 8.8.8.8
List interfaces: resolvectl status. Use correct interface name.
DNS zone may have DNSSEC issues. Check with: resolvectl query --validate=no domain
Try different DNS server. Check if domain exists with other resolvers.
Verify domain spelling. Domain may not be registered or DNS propagation pending.

common_errors.cause: No DNS servers set for interface or globally
common_errors.solution: Set DNS: resolvectl dns eth0 8.8.8.8. Or configure via networkd/NetworkManager.

common_errors.cause: Requested feature not compiled into systemd-resolved
common_errors.solution: Check systemd build options. Feature may require newer version.
